name: Devs CRM – Manage tasks, attendance and teams all together
author: DevsBrain

sections.description:
DevCRM is a comprehensive WordPress plugin tailored for crm management and member tasks management. With DevCRM, you can effortlessly add members, assign tasks, and monitor progress. Members can conveniently check in and out, facilitating efficient attendance management.

Short Description

DevCRM simplifies project management and member attendance and tasks tracking for your teams.

Features

  • Seamlessly manage tasks, members, attendance, and task editing
  • Delete members, edit attendance, and tasks with ease
  • Delete attendance and tasks as needed for streamlined management

Need Any Help?

  • Please mail us at devsbrainctg@gmail.com
  • We provide live support

Usage

  1. After activating the DevCRM plugin, navigate to DevCRM > Members and add new members.
  2. You can add member by add existing or add new.
  3. Members can check in and out by accessing the member table, which will be reflected in the attendance records.
  4. To assign tasks to members, go to DevCRM > Tasks and click on the “Add Task” button.
  5. After adding tasks, Click on task that you want to edit then you see the task details slide over page.
  6. In the task, you can add title of the task then write the task descriptions. Also you can added task images, status, priority, points, start date, end date and task comments.
  7. Every task can be assign to specific members.
  8. Members can view their assigned tasks by navigating to DevCRM > Tasks.
  9. Task will be filtering tasks by status.
  10. Check on task checkbox to mark it complete, which will shown in complete category.
  11. If you want to delete task there is a delete icon on every task.
  12. Navigate to Setting page if you want to add your desire status and priority options.

Requirements

  • WordPress 4.0 or higher
  • PHP 7.2.2 or higher

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 (or later) license.

Support

If you need any assistance or have any questions about the plugin, please open a support ticket and we will be happy to help.

Contribution

If you want to contribute to the development of the plugin, you can submit a pull request on the plugin’s Github repository.
sections.installation:
1. Login to your WordPress admin dashboard.
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  3. Click on the “Upload Plugin” button.
  4. Choose the plugin zip file and click on the “Install Now” button.
  5. Activate the plugin and check it in the settings link.
sections.changelog:
1.0.8

  • Initial release

1.0.9

  • some style fixes
  • Bug fixes for add member

1.1.0

  • Add attendance calendar
  • Dashboard update
  • task details bug fixed

1.1.1

  • Add Employee attendance table
  • Update Dashboard with all update status, employee attendance
  • Add time tracking

1.1.2

  • update dashboard with more data
  • time tracking fixed
  • add employee bug fixed
